listitem.para: Interval expressed in second units, for example crlcheckinterval=8h for 8 hours, after which pluto will fetch new Certificate Revocation List (CRL) from crl distribution points. List of used CRL distribution points are collected from CA certificates and end certificates. Loaded X.509 CRL's are verified to be valid and updates are imported to NSS database. If set to 0 CRL updating is disabled.
By default CRL updating is disabled (0).
